availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Samuel W. Lucas (Scott County, KY, physician)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, physician. Pennsylvania native. Married to Nancy A. Browning Lucas in Bracken County, Kentucky, on September 23, 1852. Father of John B. Lucas, Fenton Lucas, Eugene Lucas, Willie B. Lucas, James C. Lucas, and Mary E. Lucas. Physician in Scott County, Kentucky, in 1860. Physician in Scott County in July 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 981.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Illinois, Moultrie County, Sullivan, p. 90A.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994029, Bracken County Marriages, p. 1.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Scott County, KY, July 1863, p. 18.
"Dr Samuel Wellington Lucas (1828-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial 121597163, accessed October 26, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/121597163.
